text: Katie Holmes and Jamie Foxx have been rumored to be dating for several years now, but they've always managed to keep their relationship under wraps. However, just last week, a report in Radar Online suggested that the pair had parted ways. Somewhat surprisingly, Holmes'rep responded to this report, telling People that ` ` The Radar story is 100 percent untrue,'' appearing to confirm that the relationship is very much still on.
